text: Updated 2025 Quinteros Immunization Simulation Nurse Content Review the following prior to your immunization simulation: • Immunizations: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/imz-schedules/child- adolescent-age.html • Hepatitis B: https://www.cdc.gov/hepatitis-b/about/index.html VIS: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/vis/vis-statements/hep-b.html • Hib: https://www.cdc.gov/hi-disease/vaccines/index.html VIS: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/vis/vis-statements/hib.html • Immunization Simulation Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lDXZpXQ7QzA • Review the vaccine-administration-needle-length worksheet in D2L. • Review and be familiar with the client’s chart in ChartFlow, the Immunization check off sheet, and Immunization ChartFlow charting rubric in D2L. • Complete the Pediatric Immunization worksheet and submit it via Dropbox on D2L by 7:00 am the morning of your scheduled immunization simulation. The following should be completed after you have completed your immunization simulation: • Immunization Sim ChartFlow charting • Immunization quiz onD2L These are due by 7:00 pm on the day of your scheduled immunization simulation.
